name: MLB Power Pros
description:
Based on the acclaimed "Power Pros" Series, MLB Power Pros delivers fast, easy-to-play fun for the entire family. Bring the diamond home to your living room with the coolest Pro Baseball action available for the Wii!

Features

• Suit up Mii characters from your Wii Console or Wii Remote and insert up to 10 Players per team.
• Mini-Models of MLB stars with comical facial expressions and hairstyles.
• Amazing gameplay animations: Double-Plays, Diving Catches and HR-Robbing Catches!
• Easy "Pick-Up-And-Play" Pitching and Hitting mechanics for instant fun.
